patterns.button_removal: Remove the Button component with FilterListIcon from the search bar section. Each page has the button in a Box with SearchField and the Filters button side by side.
patterns.existing_filtering: All pages already have functional filtering via search (SearchField) and tab-based filtering (Tabs or SegmentedTabs)
patterns.import_cleanup: After removing the button, FilterListIcon import may no longer be needed if not used elsewhere in the file

existing_implementations.description: Found 7 list pages with non-functional Filter buttons. Each button has FilterListIcon but no onClick handler. Pages already have search + tab filtering.
key_insights: Filter button appears in a Box container with SearchField
No onClick handler attached - completely non-functional
Each page has filteredItems variable that filters by search + tabs

decision_rationale.approach: Remove buttons rather than implement functionality
reasoning: Pages already have sufficient filtering (search + tabs)
Simpler solution that addresses UX problem immediately
Can add advanced filtering later if actually needed
Follows principle of not misleading users with non-functional UI
